title: Pat Cummins T20 Franchise achieves a major partnership ahead of the 2025 season, share market witness 3% growth
body:
Shares of Hexaware Technologies climbed 3% to Rs 828 after the IT services company announced a strategic partnership with Major League Cricket (MLC) team, the San Francisco Unicorns. This collaboration, set to run through the 2026 season, will see Hexaware’s branding featured on the team’s helmets and caps, as well as on perimeter signage during matches.

Strengthening Digital Innovation in Sports

The partnership aligns with Hexaware’s commitment to community engagement and advancing digital solutions in sports. The San Francisco Unicorns, finalists in the 2024 MLC Championship, are gearing up for their third season in 2025. Their upcoming matches will take place in key locations across the Bay Area, Texas, and North Carolina, bringing cricket closer to American audiences.

Leadership Perspectives on the Collaboration

Anand Rajaraman, co-owner of the San Francisco Unicorns, expressed enthusiasm about the partnership, stating:

“Hexaware Technologies' dedication to innovation and excellence matches our vision for the future of cricket. This collaboration will not only boost the team’s capabilities but also enhance engagement with fans and communities worldwide.”

Echoing similar sentiments, R Srikrishna, CEO and Executive Director of Hexaware, emphasized the company’s mission to leverage technology for exceptional experiences. “Partnering with the Unicorns is a step forward in bringing innovation to cricket while fostering deeper connections with fans,” he remarked.

Hexaware Technologies’ Market Performance

Hexaware Technologies recently made its debut on the stock exchanges on February 19, following a well-received initial public offering (IPO). While the stock’s listing was relatively subdued, the IPO garnered significant investor interest, securing a 2.66 times subscription.

The Rs 8,750-crore IPO, held from February 12-14, was priced within a band of Rs 674 - 708 per share. A total of Rs 2,598 crore was raised from anchor investors, underscoring strong market confidence in the company.
summary: The San Francisco Unicorns, a team in the Major League Cricket (MLC) tournament, has announced a strategic partnership with Hexaware Technologies that will run through the 2026 season. As part of the partnership, Hexaware's branding will be featured on the team's helmets and caps, as well as on perimeter signage during matches. The Unicorns are gearing up for their third season in 2025, with upcoming matches taking place in key locations across the Bay Area, Texas, and North Carolina. The team was a finalist in the 2024 MLC Championship.

title: MLC 2025 All Teams Squad, Captain, Players List | Major League Cricket 2025 All Team Squads
body:
Find the MLC 2025 Squads, Captain, Players List, Teams List along with Major League Cricket 2025 Squad only on indiacricketschedule.com

Are you looking Major League Cricket 2025 All Team Squads, Captain and Players List for the Upcoming Match 2025? - We are here shared in this page Major League Cricket 2025 All Team Squads 2025 with Teams Captain and players list selected for Upcoming Twenty20 cricket Tournament.

We have shared here the complete list of squads, players list and captain of all the teams for the MLC 2025 tournament announced by all the franchises.

The Major League Cricket 2025 (also know as MLC T20 2025 Squad, MLC 2025 Team Players list) is a 1st edition of the Major League Cricket of Twenty20 franchise League organized by the American Cricket Enterprises (ACE) in the United States.

The MLC 2025 tournament is scheduled to be played from July 2025 – July 2025.

Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025 Tournament Summary

DatesJuly 2025 – July 2025 CountriesUnited States AdministratorAmerican Cricket Enterprises (ACE) FormatTwenty20 Number of teams6 Matches19 Tournament formatDouble Round-robin and playoffs Official Websitemajorleaguecricket.com

summary:
**Tournament Details:**

* Name: Major League Cricket (MLC) 2025
* Format: Twenty20
* Administrator: American Cricket Enterprises (ACE)
* Dates: July 2025 - July 2025
* Number of teams: 6
* Matches: 19
* Tournament format: Double Round-robin and playoffs
* Official website: majorleaguecricket.com

**Teams and Squads:**

1. **Texas Super Kings**
	* Captain: Faf du Plessis
	* Coach: Stephen Fleming
	* Players: Dwayne Bravo, Devon Conway, Aaron Hardie, Milind Kumar, Aiden Markram, and others
2. **Los Angeles Knight Riders**
	* Captain: Sunil Narine
	* Coach: Phil Simmons
	* Players: Saif Badar, Unmukt Chand, Derone Davis, Corné Dry, Adithya Ganesh, and others
3. **MI New York**
	* Captain: Kieron Pollard
	* Coach: Robin Peterson
	* Players: Ehsan Adil, Trent Boult, Dewald Brevis, Ruben Clinton, Tim David, and others
4. **San Francisco Unicorns**
	* Captain: TBD
	* Coach: Shane Watson
	* Players: Corey Anderson, Pat Cummins, Finn Allen, Brody Couch, Karima Gore, and others
5. **Seattle Orcas**
	* Captain: Wayne Parnell
	* Coach: Pravin Amre
	* Players: Nauman Anwar, Hammad Azam, Michael Bracewell, Nandre Burger, Quinton de Kock, and others
6. **Washington Freedom**
	* Captain: TBD (Steve Smith announced as captain later)
	* Coach: Ricky Ponting
	* Players: Travis Head, Glenn Maxwell, Andries Gous, Lockie Ferguson, Andrew Tye, and others
